catalog_info.title: Colloquial Egyptian Arabic
catalog_info.notes: Not open to auditors. Enrollment limited to 12. Students who have completed Arabic 134 may not take this course for credit.
catalog_info.prereq: Recommended: Two years of Standard Arabic or the equivalent.
catalog_info.description: Introduces students to Egyptian Arabic, the most widely recognized dialect in the Arab world. The course emphasizes the development of speaking and listening skills through the reinforcement of grammar and vocabulary.
